text:
Have you guys seen the new VSCo Journal feature? They just announced/released an update today. Seems pretty cool for long form content, although I still probably will forget to use it after a week.

<http://grid.vsco.co/journal/vsco-cam-40-for-ios-8-iphone-ipad>
